item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/skin-system/#comment-613">Trina</a>.
That's not a dumb question! Definitely wash your face with cleanser after you work out. You don't want any of that oil and bacteria hanging around on your face all day. It's totally fine to use cleanser twice a day, just be sure you're moisturizing afterwards and you'll be fine!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Trina.

That’s not a dumb question! Definitely wash your face with cleanser after you work out. You don’t want any of that oil and bacteria hanging around on your face all day. It’s totally fine to use cleanser twice a day, just be sure you’re moisturizing afterwards and you’ll be fine!

item.title: By: Trina
item.dc:creator: Trina
item.description: So I have a somewhat dumb question. I work out first thing in the morning before I shower or wash my face or anything. Should I be using my face cleanser after all that hot, sweaty mess, or should I just rinse and clean at the end of the day?
item.content:encoded: So I have a somewhat dumb question. I work out first thing in the morning before I shower or wash my face or anything. Should I be using my face cleanser after all that hot, sweaty mess, or should I just rinse and clean at the end of the day?
